title: Oregon Caves National Monument & Preserve: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps      Â    Maps to Oregon Caves  Map to Oregon Caves, 175 KB pdf file  Map to Oregon Caves, 37 KB pdf file, provided by MapQuest  Map of Oregon, 8 MB pdf file, provided by Oregon Department of Transportation   *Please Note  If you use GPS or get directions not provided by NPS you will be given directions to Oregon Caves that is the shortest distant--by use of Forest Service roads from Williams, Oregon. This route is NOT recommended. The road at times is one-lane, not paved, and sometimes not clearly marked. You will need a vehicle with 4-wheel drive. Although this route is shorter, it will take you longer to reach Oregon Caves.   Map of Oregon Caves National Monument  Map of Oregon Caves National Monument Boundary, created by Oregon Caves' staff, 4,400 KB pdf file Map of Oregon Caves National Monument, as seen on our brochure,  about 27,000 KB  Map of Hiking Trails at Oregon Caves National Monument  Map of Oregon Caves Hiking Trails, created by Oregon Caves' staff, 1,300 KB pdf file  Map of the Tour Route Inside Oregon Caves  Map Inside Oregon Caves, created by Oregon Caves' staff, 375 pdf  What are the Addresses?  Oregon Caves National Monument is located at: 19000 Caves Hwy, Cave Junction, OR 97523 Oregon Caves Lodge, the Oregon Caves Chateau is located at: 20000 Caves Hwy, Cave Junction, OR 97523
